opinion.case_name: Medellin v. Dretke, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division

opinion:
543 U.S. 1032

MEDELLIN
v.
DRETKE, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTIONS DIVISION.

No. 04-5928.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 10, 2004.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted. Reported below: 371 F. 3d 270.
